thread.title: Christine Y Coleman
thread.title_full: Artfinder reviewed by Christine Y Coleman

author: Christine Y Coleman
title: Christine Y Coleman
text: This was my first online art purchase, and it went smoothly. The piece I bought looks exactly like it did online (even better, actually). The artist was responsive and helpful. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase from Artfinder again, and I recommend it as a source for original art.
